title: By the way
author: VD
content_html: If any of you clicked on the BUSH FILMED IN UNDERWEAR link on Drudge today, I don’t want to know. I don’t even want to think about it. The only thing that is scarier is the thought of a John and Theresa Kerry video ala Pam and Tommy showing up on the Internet. She’s cheeky, sexy… whatever.
content_text: If any of you clicked on the BUSH FILMED IN UNDERWEAR link on Drudge today, I don’t want to know.  I don’t even want to think about it.  The only thing that is scarier is the thought of a John and Theresa Kerry video ala Pam and Tommy showing up on the Internet.  She’s cheeky, sexy… whatever.
